doc:
Joseph Marcell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Marcell 0 Joseph Marcell (born August 14, 1948) is a British actor and comedian best known for his role as Geoffrey Butler, the butler on the NBC sitcom The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air from September 1990, until it ended in May 1996. Born in Saint Lucia, he moved to the United Kingdom when he was nine years old, and grew up in Peckham, South London. Marcell lives in Banstead, Surrey. He studied theatre and science at the University of Sheffield, then took courses in speech and dance at the Central School of Speech and Drama. Joseph_Marcell ( born August_14_,_1948 ) is a_British_actor_and_comedian best_known for his_role as Geoffrey_Butler , the_butler on the_NBC_sitcom The_Fresh_Prince of Bel-Air from September_1990 , until it ended in May_1996 . Born in Saint_Lucia , he moved to the_United_Kingdom when he was nine_years old , and grew up in Peckham , South_London . Marcell lives in Banstead , Surrey . He studied theatre_and_science at the_University of Sheffield , then took courses in speech_and_dance at the_Central_School of Speech_and_Drama .
